How many people are affected by autosomal dominant nocturnal frontal lobe epilepsy ?,ADNFLE appears to be an uncommon form of epilepsy; its prevalence is unknown. This condition has been reported in more than 100 families worldwide.,GHR,autosomal dominant nocturnal frontal lobe epilepsy
